DestructiveDilemnaInclusion (python class)ÔÉÅ

See also

math concept | python declaration class | python sample

This section presents the DestructiveDilemnaInclusion python class.

This class models the inclusion of the destructive- inference-rule in the target theory-elaboration-sequence.

Punctilious users do not need to instanciate objects from this class. In effect, the TheoryElaborationSequence class exposes the destructive_ property, and instanciation is automatic when this property is accessed for the first time.
